name: Sparky
desc: Our protagonist! Need I say more?
quote: What's this? Cake? Eat! What's this? Donut? Eat! What's this? More food? Eat! Hey, you took the last pancake! I'M GOING TO KILL YOU!
about:
Sparky is a cheerful girl who once stood for something. She hides her trauma behind bright smiles and is almost uncapable of taking anything seriously. Usually she looks happy to other people, but she can turn aggressive at the drop of a pin. She is currently the bodyguard of [Animus](../animus/).

Thanks to [Ribbon](/characters/ribbon/) and [her mom](/characters/amber/), she is an excellent chef.

She's sort of a control freak. After the entire Hillslope thing she started getting scared of anything being out of her control. She also harbored naive but beautiful dreams about truth and justice. She died in the realization that she grew into exactly the person her younger self used to hate.
trivia: She twiddles her whisker-like hair when lying.
Tofu is her favorite food. All kinds of them.
She loves spicy food.
She loves food.
If she had a lusus, it would be a jackalope.
If she were ever to have a theme song, it would be titled Sugar High.
note:
- The strand of hair on her left cheek is longer, touching on her chin, while the strand on her right cheek is shorter.
- The highlights on her hair goes down, up, and then down.
- Her pupils point towards the middle! Unless she's looking at somewhere in particular.

name: Amber
desc: Hardworking girl who would be cheerful if she had the time to smile.

name: Peacock
desc: Creepy old boy who knows everything and more.

attr.Marital status:
Widowed
(Previously widowed by Rainbow, divorced Reindeer, and widowed by Amber)

about:
Peacock is [Hyrax](/characters/hyrax/)'s old friend and personal attorney.

~~He is also [Sparky](/characters/sparky/)'s reincarnation.~~

{% image 'gallery/' 'peacock exploding butt.png' 200 "Willow exploding Peacock's butt" 'right' %}

He is practical and rational, and often appears quite emotionless. Around his kids, he constantly looks like he's about to kill himself.

His job, as he described it, is "professional butt-wiper." He covers up Starcorp's illegal activities, either by framing them as legal, or making sure no one has enough evidence to implicate them. Big things don't pop up that often though, so most of his time is spent union-busting and shutting people up about general employee mistreatment.
trivia: If he had a lusus, it would be a peacock.
note: The highlight on his hair goes up, down, and then up.

name: Willow
about: Ah, the cute little spoiled kid.

name: Ribbon
about:
Ribbon is a bakery owner in Coastline. Everybody likes her.

Her bakery is a front for a mafia operation though.

name: Qibli
quote: This pearl was not from an oyster. It was from a human. No, not man-made. From a human, the way ivory was from elephants.
about:
She is a *huge* pussy. Overthinks everything, tries to chicken out of more, always worrying about how things could go wrong.

She has magic, an extremely rare [superpower](/world/superpowers/). Her wand is a cheap plastic toy bought when she was three years old, a purple five-point star on a stick.

~~She's also supposed to represent me by the way.~~

She's really nerdy. She likes spy thrillers and computer programming, though she sucks at it. She also loves reading and drawing comics.
trivia: She always talks in past tense. If you see her talking in present tense, then I probably made a mistake.
Her family has a cat named Sandstorm.
Lightning is taken from one of my first OCs ever, a Warrior cat named Lightningtail. (That was before I read Dawn of the Clans.)
If she were ever to have a theme song, it would be titled Hotpot for One（单人火锅）.
If she had a lusus, it would be a husky.

name: Sky
about:
Sky is an adventurous boy who cannot stop moving.

He likes cardistry and is nearly always twiddling a desk of cards in his right hand.

His preferred weapon is a set of four cards made of steel with sharp edges, which act like throwing stars. The cards are aces of each suit.

He is really into stuff he considers cool, like photography, military, and science. He ended up looking nerdy.
trivia: He is left-handed.
He has six countryball dolls on his desk, one for each country, that sqeaks when you squish them.
note: - Left horn points down, right horn points up.

name: Firecrackers
desc: Big kind boy with no manners.
about: Firecrackers likes cursing even more than Sparky does. It's better when he's directly speaking to you; he would only stick a lot of middle fingers at you. But when he's texting, you can expect a curse every sentence.
trivia: Firecrackers is mute, if you haven't noticed.
If he had a lusus, it would be a golden retriever.

name: Myriad
about: Myriad has a mutation that gives her a pair of fairy wings.

name: Tomato
desc: The guy who can solve all your problems but doesn't want to.
quote: I can fix anything... From a leaking pipe... to a shattered bone... to a broken heart...

name: Trinket
trivia: She's albino

name: Fantasy
about: The big sister away at [college](/world/bauhinia/flower-city/ufc/) and hardly heard from, except when she comes back for holidays. Died under mysterious circumstances, though this time the mystery may *finally* be too dangerous for Sparky to poke her nose in.

name: Ironheart
trivia: If he had a lusus, it would be an elephant.

name: Nightsun
trivia: Strawberry is his favorite flavor of lolipop.
note: - The highlight on his hair goes up, down, and then up.

name: Bramble
desc: Silly little boy who writes his feelings all over his face.
about: Fantasy's son.

name: Goose
quote: If you feel unloved, we can send you to the Ministry of Love, where you'll be loved *so much* you don't *ever* need to be loved again!
about:
Goose is *just* like other girls. She likes everything other girls like. She does everything other girls do. She listens to whatever music is most popular at the moment. She watches whatever show is most popular at the moment.

Goose is just happy to spend her life on the bandwagon.

---

Goose is an officer at the [Ministry of State Security](/world/bauhinia/mss/). She likes juggling her baton and giving vague threats about sending people to a possible Ministry of Love. She has a knack of trying her best at everything she puts her mind to do.

She 's 29 but still lives with her parents. If they died she would bury herself with them.
trivia: She gives off a goofy villain vibe.
She loves juggling her baton, kicking it from one foot to the other, catching it on her chin, spinning it on her fingertips, and throwing it at random colleagues (usually Pumpkin).
If she were ever to have a theme song, it would be titled Goosebumps（鹅皮疙瘩）.
If she had a lusus, it would be a goose.

name: Pumpkin
about: Pumpkin is a goofy guy who loves slurping boba tea and hates filling out forms.
trivia: He gives off a goofy dumbass vibe.

name: Halcyon
desc: The only one in the team who actually works.
about: Halcyon is a [Morelandian](/world/moreland/) spy working for the [MSS](/world/bauhinia/mss/).

name: Paperweight
desc: Grouchy old guy who hates fun.
about:
Paperweight is a senior officer at the [Ministry of State Security](/world/bauhinia/mss/).

He usually maintains a very calm and authoritative composure to others, especially the people he deals with at work — spies, moles, and pesky annoying kids. But under his composure, he is a frothing pit of pure rage. He is constantly angry at everything at once but nothing in particular, saddled by the weight of his own guilt and his colleague's suspicion of treason. To people he knows, like [his](/characters/goose/) [subordinates](/characters/pumpkin/), he yells at them all the time. Also he's homophobic as fuck.

He misses the old times when he could actually run without his knees screaming murder and shoot a gun without his hands shaking. This is why he hates young people — because he's kind of jealous.

He wishes someone could believe him. He wanted [Whiteout](/characters/whiteout/) back.

---

Everyone in this stupid world is an idiot. Including me.

Pumpkin should go fuck his own perverted gay ass! I'd drown him inside a milk tea pool! (Pumpkin: that's a nice way to die actually) Goose can *never* understand human speech. Oh, have the report on my desk by 3, I'd say. She'd flip through the window at 3 in the *fucking morning* and make security piss their pants. Halcyon, would you mind your *own* fucking business? I'm just old; I'm not fucking stupid! You don't have to remind me about that meeting over and over and over — I can keep time better than you could, so shut up!

Sigh. Finally some peace and quiet. Med time. Let me take a blood pressure too… Still a little high. Alright.

Sometimes I wonder if I could just give up and let myself die. What's the point of living like this, isolated by my colleagues, and shunned by my family? Maybe there exists an afterlife, where I could see *them* again… I could tell her that I'm sorry, and that I tried. I never got to ask him whether he was proud of me.

Ugh, Halcyon again. What does that guy want?? He's acting like a mole there with his nose in everyone's businesses. Idiots. All the best people die early. The idiots survive on, alive but not living.
trivia: He canonically speaks Cantonese. He's the only character who does, and other characters don't find anything off about it.
他说且只会说粤语。反正大家也听得懂。

He has a little "my goddamn leash of curses" which is a medicine box, the kind that has cells arranged in three rows (for breakfast, lunch, and dinner) and seven columns (from Monday to Sunday). You put the required amount of pills in each box at the start of every week and take the pills as scheduled. He hates it to the guts.

name: Gecko
quote: Uh... You don't look like Peacock.
about:
我嘞个绝世大冤种啊我的壁虎

Bauhinian smuggler. Had been caught once, but returned to the trade because she didn't know what else to do. Her worst mistake is not knowing that [Peacock](/characters/peacock/) has a [stepdaughter](/characters/sparky/) who is batshit crazy.
trivia: If she had a lusus, it would be a gecko.

name: Lark
about: A Morelandian agent in Bauhinia, recruited to recover the nuke that the kids found.
trivia: If he had a lusus, it would be a lark.

name: Pearl
desc: A little girl who cries pearls
about:
She cries pearls. Yes, her tears are literally pearls.

She is everything you would expect a little girl to be: cute, curious, instinctively kind, loves animals, and incredibly stupid.
trivia: She has both a Bauhinian passport and a Sylvandian one, both totally legal (not forged).

name: Snake
about:
[Jackpot](/character/jackpot/)'s mischevious and ambitious son.

Snake has a mutation that gives him a pair of bird wings.

He is *very* full of himself, but still likes being friends with other people a lot, so he is more pleasant to be around than his dad.

He still lives with his dad because he's too young, but he dreams of leaving him, starting his own business, and living in a big house all on his own.

He has a pet snake named Blizzard. It is -- surprise -- a Blizzard Cornsnake. He thinks snakes are cool, which is why he also named himself Snake.

name: Snowball
about: Snowball is a part of a nomadic tribe in [Moreland](/world/moreland/)

name: Buttercup
desc: Fleash rebel fighting for independence from Sylvandia.
trivia: She's probably the character with the longest color palette.

name: Beauty
about:
The oldest daughter in the Cherry-Hyrax family, always neck-deep in pop culture. Her desk is plastered with pictures of her favorite idols.

She has strabismus, where her right eye points outward.

name: Devotion
desc: The boss of everything in existence.

name: Elegance
desc: For fuck's sake the only normal person in the family.

name: Animus
desc: Would be normal too if he weren't a boy which makes him oh-so-special.

attr.Orientation: Homosexual, came out to Sparky only

name: Hyrax
about: Hyrax is the chairman of Starcorp and the father of 5 children — four, actually.

name: Kismet

attr.Soul: Has 6, an original one and 5 superpowered ones, rainbow, all gas

about:
The ~~dictator~~ president of Bauhinia. Extremely powerful.

Kismet was born with nothing special, but he consumed 5 other souls with extremely strong superpowers and now he has all 5 [common powers](/world/superpowers/). He is after [Tundra](/characters/tundra/)'s immortal body. If magic weren't impossible to get ahold of, he would've went for that too.

His 6 souls made him into a rainbow and molded his text color into pure black.

He has his extremely powerful mind-reading tuned to the entire Flower City. Usually people would just be background noise, but he would be alerted if there are insubservient thoughts.

He will also order the [eternal death](/world/bauhinia/#eternal-death) of anyone who learns his name, outside of a select whitelist.

name: Sundae
about: Sundae is nice.

name: Dragonfly
desc: Some martial arts master in the woods.

attr.Weapon: His fists. A wooden branch if there is one nearby.

about: Dragonfly is a security guard for Starcorp. He trained Sparky in bodyguarding.
trivia: If he had a lusus, it would be a dragonfly.

name: Groovy
about: Groovy is Nightsun's case officer.

name: Koala
desc: Jerboa's mother, lead scientist of Project Boomerang.

name: Kangaroo
desc: Jerboa's father, co-lead scientist of Project Boomerang.

name: Robin
about: Took over as lead scientist of Project Boomerang after the disappearance of Koala and Kangaroo.
trivia: If she had a lusus, it would be a robin.

name: Frosting
about:
Frosting grew up in the Project Boomerang laboratory with her parents.

She grew up to be a government archivist, tasked with erasing records of disappeared people in addition to whatever archivists usually do. She also manages the soul vault.

She let Jerboa into the archives to read about Project Boomerang and his parents.

name: Jerboa
desc: Owner, bartender, and everything else of the tavern!
quote: Who ordered me to do it? It's -- OW -- I did it on my own! Nobody ordered me!!

attr.Occupation: Bartender, chemist, undertaker, and chemist again

trivia: If he had a lusus, it would be a jerboa.

name: Sunflower
about: Sunflower is a high school student put on "suicide watch" by the [SPF](/world/westavia/spf/).

name: Helsinki
about: Helsinki is a distant relative of [Pumpkin](/characters/pumpkin/)'s, descended from the part of his family that didn't immigrate to [Bauhinia](/world/bauhinia/). She lives in [the village](/world/westavia/pumpkins-village/).

name: Mooncake
about: A policeman in a [little village](/world/westavia/pumpkins-village/).

name: Cobalt
about:
Cobalt is as cishet as a cishet could ever cishet. She's so cishet that when she got into [Ironheart](/characters/ironheart/)'s body, she divorced his wife and attempted to get gender-affirming surgery, the latter of which [Sparky](/characters/sparky/) successfully stopped because Ironheart is also as cishet as a cishet could ever cishet and Sparky didn't want him coming back into a woman's body.

She is also a soul-dealer well-trained in the art of soul extraction.

name: Kaleidoscope
about: Kaleidoscope greatly cares for his friends and family, to the point where he even went into the mafia to pay back his father's debt. Ironically, the kidnapping scene he faked in the hopes that his friends would give up on him thinking he's dead actually led them into the underground as well to look for him.

name: Moonbeam
about: Moonbeam is a Sylvandian psychic well-trained in soul-extraction.

name: Cosmo
quote: If everyone believes it, then it is the truth.

attr.Soul: Has two: one pink (gas, heart-shaped), the other blue (liquid, slimy)

about:
Cosmo has the mind reading superpower thanks to her third eye, but it's so weak that she can only tell whether somebody is lying intentionally -- though she's quite good at that. She can't tell if someone is lying by omission, or tell facts from lies (so if someone genuinely believes in what they're saying, she will think they're telling the truth), but if you're lying and she heard you, she will know.

When she lies herself, her third eye closes. Otherwise, it stays open, even when she's sleeping. (It closes when she washes her face too though, or it's gonna be awkward.)
note:
- Left eye blue, right eye pink. Left eyebrow pink, right eyebrow blue. Eyelashes match the eyes.
- Sleeves are wider than a normal sleeve.
- Both the inside of her ears and her dress are gradient from pink (top) to blue (bottom).
- Shoes and hairband match color.
- The yellow eye (yellow with black pupil) is always open, unless she's lying.

name: Tephra
desc: The boss of everything at once, but nothing in particular.
quote: Sit down everyone. The investigation is underway.
trivia: If he had a lusus, it would be a desert fox.

name: Guillotine
desc: Who is this girl and why does she want us to call her Guillotine?
quote: I'm dead now! You can't kill me!

name: Tundra
trivia: If he had a lusus, it would be a sloth.

name: Starry
about: Went into a coma after getting hit in the head. Since then, [Ribbon](/characters/ribbon/) had kept him alive.

name: Jackalope

attr.Nickname: Jack; Alpha (code name by the MSS)
attr.Soul: Solid, a tangle of barbed wire

about: Jackalope is an officer at the Intelligence Corps of the Guardian Moose.

name: Whiteout
about: Whiteout is a stern MSS officer, but under her hard cover, she harbors great love for her colleagues and apprentice.

name: Entity

attr.Soul: Solid, soft and squishy like a marshmallow

about:
Entity is an executioner.

Not really though. He's a soul-extractor.

He takes the souls of those sentenced to eternal death — not even allowed to reincarnate. He extracts them, locks them up in a jar, and sends the freshly-drained body to cremation. It's also the reason why he met Frosting, the archivist who handles the soul jars.

At work, he pulls up a stoic and serious face to hide his emotions. To his friends and family, though, he's a scaredy-cat. He screams at the tiniest of bugs and have to have Frosting deal with them. He jumps at the slightest sound.

He believes whole-heartedly that the government has a chip in his brain to monitor his thoughts.

---

People will tell you that bodies without souls are just corpses. I know it's false. They are very much alive. They can live on for around a week. And guess what? For the first few days, the soul — if it had not found a new body — can still feel the old body. I found out during my soul-extraction training, when my friend and I pulled each other's soul out in turn for fun. Which means, the condemned can feel their body being burned to ashes.

I try to live with the knowledge. That they will suffer the fire, that *I* enabled it, and that most of the time, their crimes aren't serious enough to warrant permanent death where even reincarnation, birthing as an *entirely new* soul, is not allowed. *Nothing* warrants that—

Stop thinking! *Stop thinking*, you stupid brain! Don't think — no, not the chip, don't think about it — Of course the government has their reasons! Some people *are* evil enough that there's no place in the world for them. Who am I to disagree? Right. Just do your job. Stop thinking about that. Think about your wife and daughter.

I take a deep breath, and I stop thinking.

name: Harmony

attr.Soul: Gas, shaped like a music note

about: Harmony attends the [MSS](/world/bauhinia/mss/)'s spy school in Flower City.
